article_title: Halbig: Evolution of Statutory Text Shows Drafters Intended to Limit ACA Subsidies To State-Established Exchanges

article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: Here is a third excerpt from the brief Jonathan Adler and I filed with the D.C. Circuit for that court’s en banc consideration of Halbig v. Burwell. (Here are the first and second excerpts.) The express authorization of tax credits only in Exchanges “established by the State” was no accident. This express language was added [...]
